feature.label: OSGI Secure Broker Feature
feature.description:
This sample project demonstrates the OSGI Secure Broker, which uses ther DS framework. There are three attendees, a server, a client and a petitioner that all communicate with each other (through a thread spawned by the server every ten seconds).
When running the application as an OSGI Framework, four commands are addded to the OSGI console: - roundhouse: a list of all the available commands - attendees: the attendees in the roundhouse - matched; attendees that are matched in an assembly - waiting: attendees who are waiting to get matched.
